comments:
Build 20020319++

1. Create a HelloWorld app in Eclipse and put a breakpoint in it.
2. Select a different project and create a remote launch config.
3. Launch the HelloWorld app remotely (be sure to start with suspend=y)
4. Connect to it with the config from step 2
5. When the debugger tries to show source, it pops up with a dialog with the
wrong project selected (as expected). Hit OK. The following NPE occurs:

java.lang.NullPointerException
